alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 5:13PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Dona Ana and northwestern El Paso Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 511 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Afton to 3 miles southwest of La Union. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anthony, Vado, Santa Teresa, Afton, Berino, Mesquite, San Miguel, Chamberino, La Union, La Mesa, Union Pacific Intermodal Terminal, Afton Generating Plant, High Valley, Mount Riley, and Kilbourne Hole. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 150 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley
